timeline.bodyText: Please add @NonNullByDefault to all of your classes
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: I filled in gaps in all classes, not only those strictly related to this new feature. This is why I put them in a separate commit. Not that I think it makes sense in all cases, as some of them contain only primitive types, but rules are rules... ;)
replies.author: rmichalak

timeline.message:
